"It's weird not seeing her panic like this~. You're not buzzing enough, Hii-chan. Buzz buzz~"

Afterglow Quotebot

Ran, Moca, Himari, Tomoe, and Tsugu every three hours! (olivemoment.com edition)

If you can't tell I don't know html or websiting at all so ummm yeah we'll figure this out together!
This bot is held together with the glue of gimmickbots and file.garden
afterglow quotes twitter HERE!!!

Ok I'm literally dropping all the quotes here in technically gross HTML HAVE FUN
